document.full_text: brazil's 2011 soybean harvest could turn out better than expected despite damaging rain with crop yields higher than previously forecast, hamburg-based oilseeds analysts oil world said on tuesday.
document.title: still hope for brazil's soybean harvest: oil world
lines_and_colors: brazil's 2011 soybean harvest could turn out better than expected despite damaging rain with crop yields higher than previously forecast, hamburg-based oilseeds analysts oil world said on tuesday.
